title: BAP leaders meet Nawabzada Kahlid Magsi
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 21 (APP):Balochistan Awami Party (BAP) leaders met with Federal Minister for Science and Technology, Nawabzada Khalid Khan Magsi here on Monday, and discussed party matters, manifesto, and initiatives for Balochistan’s development.
The delegation, comprising senior BAP leaders, including Mir Jan Muhammad Khan Jamali, Senator Danesh Kumar, former Senator Sana Jan Jamali, and Mir Jaffar Khan Magsi, discussed key issues and strategies for the province’s progress.
During the meeting, Mir Jan Muhammad Khan Jamali, Senior Leader of BAP and former Chief Minister of Balochistan, extended his congratulations to Nawabzada Khalid Khan Magsi on assuming the charge of Federal Minister for Science and Technology. Jamali wished Magsi success in his new role.
The Federal Minister expressed optimism about achieving peace and stability in Balochistan, emphasizing the importance of collective efforts.
The meeting highlighted the government’s commitment to promoting technological advancements and economic development in the province.
The BAP leaders and the minister exchanged views on leveraging science and technology to drive growth and improve living standards in Balochistan. The meeting’s outcomes are expected to benefit the people of Balochistan.
The BAP leaders’ engagement with the Federal Minister demonstrates their dedication to serving the public interest and addressing the needs of the province. The meeting was seen as a positive step towards promoting development and stability in Balochistan.
